name: Oliver Gavin
introduction: Oliver Benjamin Gavin (born September 29, 1972 in Huntingdon) is a British racing driver, who never made it into a Formula One race seat, but made a living as the safety car driver between 1997 and 1999, before being replaced by Bernd Maylnder from 2000 onwards. He almost made it into a Pacific seat for the 1995 Australian Grand Prix, but did not have a Super License.
